column1: This appeal is preferred against the Judgement, delivered by the learned Judge of the High
Court  of  Kalutara,  dated  23.07.2020,  by  which,  the  accused-appellant,  was  convicted  and
sentenced to 18 years rigorous imprisonment and imposed a fine of Rupees Ten Thousand
with a default term of 06 months Simple Imprisonment and Rupees Two Hundred and Fifty
Thousand compensation with a default term of 12 months Simple Imprisonment.
